title._content: Sea-swept Galveston - A once prosperous section of beautiful homes near the beach - Disaster 1900.

description._content: Title: Sea-swept Galveston - A once prosperous section of beautiful homes near the beach - Disaster 1900. Creator: Underwood & Underwood Date: September 9, 1900 Part Of: Banks McLaurin, Jr. stereograph collection Physical Description: 1 photographic print on stereo card: stereograph, gelatin silver; 8.9 x 17.8 cm File: ag2000_1296_01_d04_tex_12r_galstorm_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu.
